articles.title: Black Friday shoppers ‘set online spending record’ - Mint Lounge
articles.description: Consumers extended their budgets by leaning on buy-now, pay-later options, according to Adobe
articles.content:
Black Friday shoppers spent a record $9.8 billion online in the US, Adobe Analytics reported, offering a positive sign for retailers facing lackluster sales forecasts for the holiday season.
